stripped_text: Place 4 credits on this event. You can spend hosted credits during runs. Run R&D. If successful, place 2 credits on this event and access 1 additional card when you breach R&D. When that run ends, you may run a remote server.
text:
Place 4[credit] on this event. You can spend hosted credits during runs.
Run R&D. If successful, place 2[credit] on this event and access 1 additional card when you breach R&D.
When that run ends, you may run a remote server.
title: Trick Shot
